query:
CREATE TABLE `user_settings` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `emailConfig` text,
  `whatsappConfig` text,
  `calendarConfig` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX `idx_user_settings_user` (`userId`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2ghn282qNtTBYRw.2c60fb684332 --database U7erxBowPGSR3wjYQtQi9z --execute CREATE TABLE `user_settings` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `emailConfig` text,
  `whatsappConfig` text,
  `calendarConfig` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX `idx_user_settings_user` (`userId`)
);
